Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Cermak. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

  • Shuttle buses from Midway to Roosevelt will continue to provide connecting service, in both directions.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
